root.name: Aggressors of Dark Kombat
root.description: OverviewAggressors of Dark Kombat is a SNK 2D-fighter that allows players to move on two 2D planes, just like in Savage Reign. Fighters can perform a "Gan Gan Attack," which is a instant KO but it can only be done when the opponent's health bar is flashing red and your power bar is full. The game has a guest character in Fuuma from SNK´s World Heroes series. Playable Characters Joe Kusanagi Fuuma Kotaro Kisarah WestfieldGoh KidokoroLee Hae GwonSheen GenusLeonhalt DomadorBobby Nelson

similar_games.game: Street Fighter II: The World Warrior
